__e: Not only officers leave the country, but women and children as well.
Besides, watches are not made to measure this kind of time... I often see her face coming out of the dark, approaching me... I then turn and go to meet her.
I think it's time we throw the rule book out the window.
And besides, I may see you some other time, some other place.
Also, I know you've always wanted horses, so I thought something with a little property might be nice.
Besides,I want everyone to know that you're mine.
Outside of hunger first thing I could remember is shame.
I've spent most of my career looking up to you, because you always did the right thing even if it meant disregarding the chain of command--
If you could do anything to keep your family safe, even if it meant breaking procedure, would you?
Like "If he can get past you hiding the treasure," "so can I" sort of thing?
I'm sorry. No, it's just that we've been married an incredibly long time, so let's just try and find other details about me besides the fact that I think everyone's an idiot.
But in between thinking how nice she looked and we should do this more often, I was... also thinking of a young woman... on the other side of the restaurant.
I think there'll be more people here...
Besides, he never would have got a shot off before me anyway, and now we have nothing.
Besides, there's a chance that I may still be able to find her.
Besides, you've been here for two years now.
Besides, you're too old to do that.
Besides you are a father, and you want the best for your family
